fields.name: Warrior
fields.description: A brave fighter with unmatched strength and prowess in melee combat.

fields.name: Mage
fields.description: A master of the arcane arts, capable of casting powerful spells.

fields.name: Rogue
fields.description: A stealthy trickster, skilled in agility and surprise attacks.

fields.name: Priest
fields.description: A devoted healer, wielding divine powers to mend wounds and cure ailments.

fields.name: Ranger
fields.description: A marksman unmatched in ranged combat, often accompanied by a loyal animal companion.

fields.name: Paladin
fields.description: A holy warrior, blending melee combat with divine magic to smite foes.
